participant_1.background:
I grew up watching my mom make mashed potatoes, and I still love them to this day.
i still like combat boots with babydoll dresses.
I started my own business and now I'm a lot happier.
i love my work and just got promoted.
i have my own salon.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy running and skateboarding to stay active and clear my head.
i prefer vinyl records to any other music recording format.
I get to work on a new project every day with the love of my life.
i wish my boyfriend didn t want an open relationship.
I like to take my time driving through the countryside and listening to music.

content.text: What's up?
Not much. Just got back from a run. How about you?
Just finished work. I'm exhausted. I'm opening my own salon next week, so I'm putting in a lot of hours.
That's awesome! Congrats. I'm glad to hear it's going well.
Thanks! It's a lot of work, but it's worth it.
I bet it is. I've always dreamed of opening my own business.
You should go for it! It's a lot of hard work, but it's so rewarding.
I know, I know. I'm just not sure what I want to do.
Well, you have plenty of time to figure it out.
Thanks. I appreciate the encouragement.
No problem. I'm always here for you.
You're a good friend.
Thanks. I try to be.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch movies, read, and go out to eat.
Same here. I love to read. I'm currently reading a book about the history of vinyl records.
That sounds interesting. I've never really been into vinyl records, but I know a lot of people who are.
Yeah, they're really popular right now.
Well, I'm going to get going. I'm exhausted.
Okay. Have a good night!
You too!
